Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 20/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
